name: wasmboy
description: Gameboy / Gameboy Color Emulator written for Web Assembly using AssemblyScript. Shell/Debugger in Preact
author: Aaron Turner

scripts.start: npm run core:build && npm run lib:build && npx concurrently --kill-others --names "DEBUGGER,CORE,LIB" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run debugger:watch" "npm run core:watch" "npm run lib:watch"
scripts.build: npm run core:build && npm run lib:build
scripts.deploy: npm run lib:deploy && npm run debugger:deploy
scripts.test:accuracy: npm run build && node --experimental-worker node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/accuracy/accuracy-test.js --exit
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && node --experimental-worker node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/performance/performance-test.js --exit
scripts.debugger:deploy: npm run debugger:build && echo 'wasmboy.app' > build/CNAME && npx gh-pages -d build
scripts.core:build: npx asc core/index.ts -b dist/core/index.untouched.wasm -t dist/core/index.untouched.wast -O3 --validate --sourceMap debugger/assets/index.untouched.wasm.map --memoryBase 0 && cp dist/core/index.untouched.wasm.map debugger/assets/index.untouched.wasm.map && echo "Built Wasm!"
scripts.lib:deploy: npm run core:build && npm run lib:build && npx np
scripts.prettier:lint: echo "Listing unlinted files, will show nothing if everything is fine." && npx prettier --config .prettierrc --list-different index.js preact.config.js style.css debugger/**/*.js debugger/**/*.css lib/**/*.js core/**/*.ts
scripts.prettier:fix: npx prettier --config .prettierrc --write index.js preact.config.js style.css debugger/**/*.js debugger/**/*.css lib/**/*.js core/**/*.ts
